directions: Place the watermelon on the bottom of a large clear bowl or trifle dish;
Layer grapes on top and sprinkle with 1 tsp sugar.
Repeat this process of sprinkling the sugar as you layer the cherries, peaches, blueberries, honeydew melon and strawberries.
Refrigerate several hours before serving. – Milwaukee Journal Sentinel/McClatchy-Tribune Information Services
title: Inger’s Seven-Layer Fruit Salad
